title: Currency Trading For Dummies, 2nd Edition by Brian Dolan
description:
Your plain-English guide to currency trading
Forex markets can be one of the fastest and most volatile financial markets to trade. Money can be lost or made in a matter of seconds, and forex markets are always moving. So how do you keep up?
